title: The Forgiveness Circuit
outcome: Free zone engineers activate the dormant 'Reconciliation Spiral' protocol, offering flagged citizens controlled pathways to reintegrate. As success stories mount, the city is pulled between systemic forgiveness and Directorate backlash, dividing the population over healing versus security.

events.description: Engineers in free zones discover Halden’s unused 'Reconciliation Spiral' protocol and launch small local pilots for restoring low-score citizens.
Early participants successfully reintegrate, taking new roles in community leadership and public service. Word of these transformations spreads quickly.
Inspired by successful stories, more districts adopt the protocol. The Directorate brands it a threat to order, clashing with Harmonists and Innovators who see it as a way forward.
Open forums debate forgiveness versus security. Some neighborhoods see rifts as residents question who deserves a second chance.
The city is polarized as growing numbers back reconciliation and reform, while Directorate loyalists intensify surveillance and enforcement in resistant areas.
